_meanings:
{@--2@} To set
free, loosen (as the voice); {#kaMWaM#} 
{#muMcati barhiRaH samadanaH#} <ls>Mk. 5. 14</ls> 
‘loosens his throat or voice’ {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} raises
a cry.

{@--4@} To set apart,
take away, except, see {#muktvA#}.

{@--4@} To abandon, deviate or
swerve from.

{@--1@}
To cause to be freed or liberated.

{@--3@} To loose, set at
liberty, liberate.

{@--1@} To wish to free or 
liberate &c.

{@--2@} ({#mumukzate, mokzate#}) To
long for final emancipation.
